Display Race stats for sites.
Usage: <cmd> SITENAME|* [Period] [detailed]

detailed can only be used if you type a sitename, will be true if not other declared.
It shows more infos about the sites you traded to/from.
If you omit period it'll use DAY.
valid periods: DAY, MONTH, YEAR

<cmd> HQ <- Start of DAY and show details
<cmd> HQ YEAR 0 <- Start of YEAR and show no details
<cmd> * MONTH <- Start of MONTH and show total count for all sites
